description:
A very special cat escapes from the Mishima labs, and Akiko is told to find it! Meanwhile, Nuku Nuku finds kittens outside and brings them back to the Natsume house. She and Ryunosuke work hard to care for them. Then Akiko`s underlings go wild again, and it`s up to Nuku Nuku to stop them!
Source: crunchyroll
